title: I need help , my loading screen keeps on crashing before the game.
body: everytime I start a game it would run smoothly until the loading screen before the actual game, I really want to play league so please help me and fix my game ASAP

replies.body: Are you getting any errors at all?  Are you seeing anything load at all in the loading screen?  I'd like to help but need more info!
after I my character icon states that its it 100 percent the game would stop loading
